availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Isaac C. Vanarsdall (Mercer County, Kentucky, sheriff. )

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Smock Vanarsdall. Father of Frank Vanarsdall and Nimrod Vanarsdall. Sheriff of Mercer County in 1860. Sheriff of Mercer County in 1862. Sheriff of Mercer County in 1863. Sheriff of Mercer County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 773.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1864,” in 1865 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1 (Frankfort, Ky.: George D. Prentice, State Printer, 1865), 175.
"John Isaac Van Arsdale (c1804-1890)," Find A Grave, Memorial #5040634, accessed April 5, 2019, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/5040634.
